---------------------
References
---------------------
- Ministry of Tourism. (2020). *Strategic Business Plan 2020/2021 – 2023/2024*. Government of Jamaica.
- Government of Jamaica. (2024). *Overarching Policy for Jamaica’s Protected Areas System*.
- Reid-Grant, K., & Bhat, M. G. (2009). *Financing marine protected areas in Jamaica: An exploratory study*. Marine Policy, 33(1), 128–136. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.marpol.2008.05.008
- Brander, L. M., et al. (2024). *The value of ecosystem services from marine and coastal ecosystems: Global estimates*. Ecosystem Services, 66, 101606. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecoser.2023.101606
- Mentefactura. (2009). *Sustainable Financing Plan for Jamaica’s System of Protected Areas*. Government of Jamaica.
